snippet.title: The End is Nigh: Shattered Spectrum Trailer + Demo Release
snippet.description:
The demo for the biggest (bigger than the base game) The End is Nigh mod is finally here!
Explore three areas of this fan-made expansion, which is about 1/10 of the gameplay content that's going to be available in the full version when it comes out.

Steam Workshop page of the demo:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2531481913

MediaFire download link for non-Steam versions of TEiN:
https://www.mediafire.com/file/419ewlh1ikw1hfr/SpectrumDemo_Jul7.zip/file

Discord server invite:
http://discord.gg/TheEndIsNigh

Installation instructions:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1mJ0rcsFDHgZiWhGbp2JHoUsngc2TW_ZoY5IW8JqdnoQ/view

Related blog post:
https://teinshatteredspectrum.wordpress.com/2021/07/06/the-demo-is-out/

What will be changed in the part of the expansion you're seeing:
-Music. We're looking for music artists. Contact NotWendy in the Discord server or on Twitter if you'd like to help.
-Intro cutscene. It's a lot of work to make and import a custom cutscene, so we left that for later. Skip the default intro for now.


Thank you all for the support! Enjoy the demo and keep an eye out for the news about the full version. We're actively working on it.
